content:
If you only have a cricket bat, you could try the following method to retrieve the lost tennis ball:

1. Extend the cricket bat: Place the cricket bat on the floor parallel to the bed and extend it under the bed as far as you can reach.
2. Locate the ball: Use the cricket bat to feel around under the bed, trying to locate the lost tennis ball.
3. Retrieve the ball: Once you have located the ball, use the cricket bat to gently push it towards the opening where you can reach it with your hand. Then, retrieve the ball by hand.

Note: Be careful when using the cricket bat, as you don't want to damage your bed or the surrounding area while trying to retrieve the ball.
